Selling Fish

Bring 10 Spotted Sunfish to Dockmaster Baren in Lakeshire.
10
10
10
10
10
10
10
10
10
10
Spotted Sunfish (10)

Description

Lake Everstill is famous for its spotted sunfish. There's always demand for them...and I'm running low!

Bring me a batch of 10 and I'll barter well for them. If you can't fish yourself, then...maybe you can get them off the murlocs!

Reward

You will receive:
Murloc Fin Soup
Recipe: Murloc Fin Soup
Fishliver Oil

Progress

You have some sunfish for me, eh?

Completion

Pleasure doin' business with you, matey!

Gains

Upon completion of quests, get:
  • 1250 Experience
  • 75 Reputation with Stormwind
